content: I am a Ph.D. candidate in Computational Biology at NTNU since August 2019. My work involves multiscale logical modeling used in data analysis and experimental design, with a special focus on pro-inflammation models used for the simulation of the single and combinatorial effect of proinflammation inhibitors, and the modeling of keratinocyte cell systems for simulating the effect of experimental perturbations done on them.

title: Eirini Tsirvouli
